pages.text: Minceraft is a distant universe that is the 'almost perfect mirror copy' of our world, 'Minecraft'. It brings only one material : $(item)the Rubidium Ore$(), fully integrated into our world like other ores like coal for example.
A photograph of the 'Minceraft' universe, in the best quality we have
Every rubidium tools imported from this universe. They are the perfect intermediate between the iron, and the diamond.
